bengaliName: নেসলে নিডো ১+ গ্রোইং আপ গুঁড়া দুধ (১-৩ বছর) ৩৫০ গ্রাম
longDesc:
Important notice: There are no substitutes of or equivalent to breast-milk.

NIDO® 1+ is a Growing Up Milk Powder for 1 to 3 years old Growing Up Babies. 

NIDO® 1+ contains:
 - Prebiotics which may help to foster beneficial bacteria (probiotic) in child’s digestive system.
 - Immuno-Nutrients that may help to strengthen the Immune system.
 - 13 Essential Vitamins that may helps in Growth and Development.
 - 9 Minerals that may helps in Growth and Development.
 - Protein that may helps in Growth and Development.
 - NO ADDED SUGAR.

Storage instructions: Follow instructions on the pack

Manufactured by Nestlé Chile S.A.
Marketed by Nestlé Bangladesh Ltd.
name: Nestlé Nido 1+ Growing Up Milk Powder (1-3 Y) 350 gm
nameWithoutSubText: Nestlé Nido 1+ Growing Up Milk Powder (1-3 Y)

bengaliName: নেস্টলে ন্যান অপটিপ্রো ২ ফর্মুলা গুঁড়া দুধ (৬ মাস+) ৪০০ গ্রাম
longDesc:
Important Notice: There is no substitutes of or equivalent to breast-milk

Nestlé® NAN® OPTIPRO® 2 is an Follow-up Formula with OPTIPRO designed for infants after 6 months onwards as the liquid part of the diet during and after weaning, in addition to other foods. It is not to be used as a breast milk substitute during the first 6 months of life. 

Nestlé® NAN® OPTIPRO® 2 contains:
 - OPTIPRO®, an optimized protein blend exclusively to NAN® that is unique in both quality and amount. It supplies the adequate amount of proteins needed for your baby’s optimal growth without overloading immature organs. 
 - BIFIDUS BL is a probiotic culture that helps to reinforce baby’s defense system.
 - DHA and ARA, two special fatty acids found in breast milk, which are important for your baby’s immune defense system and contribute to the development of brain and vision.

Storage instructions: Follow instructions on the pack

Manufactured by Nestlé Philippines Ltd.
Marketed by Nestlé Bangladesh Ltd.
name: Nestlé Nan Optipro 2 Formula Milk Powder (6 M+) 400 gm
nameWithoutSubText: Nestlé Nan Optipro 2 Formula Milk Powder (6 M+)

longDesc:
Important Notice: There is no substitutes of or equivalent to breast-milk

Nestlé® NAN® AL 110™ is a Lactose Free special Dietary Formula especially designed for the dietary management of lactose tolerance/ mal-digestion during & after diarrhea and can be given from Birth onwards in accordance with the advise of Medical professionals. 

Nestlé® NAN® AL 110™ contains:
 - Probiotic L. reuteri which shortens the duration of diarrhea by promoting healthy gut flora.
 - Lactose free which is effective for managing lactose intolerance. It contains glucose polymers as a source of carbohydrate  which is low in osmolality and is easily digested and absorbed during diarrhea. 
 - Nucleotides which supports the recovery of damaged gut, shorten the duration and reduce the severity of diarrhea.
 - Balanced ratio of DHA and ARA which plays an essential role in immunity. 

Storage instructions: Follow instructions on the pack

Manufactured by Nestlé Philippines Ltd.
Marketed by Nestlé Bangladesh Ltd.
name: Nestlé NAN AL 110 Formula Milk Powder (0-6 M+) 400 gm
nameWithoutSubText: Nestlé NAN AL 110 Formula Milk Powder (0-6 M+)

bengaliName: বায়োমিল ২ দুধ (৬-১২ মাস) টিন ১ কেজি
longDesc:
Origin: Belgium
BIOMIL® 2 is a follow-up milk for infants of 6 months and over.

BIOMIL® 2 is a preparation, in the form of a powder, based on modified cows’ milk taking into account the nutritional needs of the child. Prepared in the strictest of hygiene conditions, the formula contains partially skimmed cows’ milk, vegetable fats and maltodextrin, to which a perfectly balanced set of vitamins and minerals has been added.

BIOMIL® 2 may be used as a supplement to or replacement for breast milk should this be lacking or insufficient. As follow-up milk is intended “for infants of 5 months and over” and constitutes “the principal liquid element of a progressively diversified diet” (Commission of the European Communities, 1991), it must supply the elements that weaning food does not provide in sufficient quantities, i.e., proteins, calcium, iron, essential fatty acids, etc.

BIOMIL® 2complies with the standards of the Codex Alimentarius, the recommendations of the European Communities and those of the European Society for Paediatric Gastroenterology, Hepatology and Nutrition (ESPGHAN).
name: Biomil 2 Milk (6-12 months) Tin 1 kg

Biomil 3 Follow-Up Milk Formula Powder has been specially developed to balance nutrition and favour the maximum growth of children aged 1 year and over.

Biomil 3 Follow-Up Milk Formula Powder is a preparation based on fresh cows’ milk, rich in energy so as to meet the increased energy needs for this age group.

Biomil 3 Follow-Up Milk Formula Powder contains milk proteins, vegetable oils, lactose, maltodextrin and saccharose.

Biomil 3 Follow-Up Milk Formula Powder is enriched with essential fatty acids, iron, zinc, copper, iodine, and 13 vitamins including most notably vitamins A, B, C, D, E, and K so as to meet the needs of small children.

LACTOGEN 1 is a spray dried Infant Formula for infants from birth onwards when they are not breastfed.”

Origin: Belgium
Biomil 3 Follow-Up Milk Formula Powder has been specially developed to balance nutrition and favour the maximum growth of children aged 1 year and over.

Biomil 3 Follow-Up Milk Formula Powder is a preparation based on fresh cows’ milk, rich in energy so as to meet the increased energy needs for this age group.

Biomil 3 Follow-Up Milk Formula Powder contains milk proteins, vegetable oils, lactose, maltodextrin and saccharose.

Biomil 3 Follow-Up Milk Formula Powder is enriched with essential fatty acids, iron, zinc, copper, iodine, and 13 vitamins including most notably vitamins A, B, C, D, E, and K so as to meet the needs of small children.

bengaliName: ফাস্কা বায়োমিল সয়মিল্ক ফ্রি ডায়েট ৪০০ গ্রাম
longDesc:
Origin: Belgium
BIOMIL® SOY is complete nutrition for infants, and has been developed from a base of soy protein isolate. BIOMIL® SOY is recommended in the event of cows’ milk protein allergies or lactose intolerance.

BIOMIL® SOY is the nutrition of choice as a supplement to or replacement for breast milk should this be lacking.

BIOMIL® SOY is a preparation based on enriched isolated soy protein so as to be perfectly suitable for the infant’s nutrition. BIOMIL® SOY contains vegetable oils and maltodextrins. BIOMIL® SOY is rich in L-methionine, taurine, choline and inositol. Il contains supplements of calcium, zinc, copper, iron and vitamins.

BIOMIL® SOY meets the nutritional needs of infants of up to one year of age, as well as those of growing children and adults requiring nutrition that does not contain any cows’ milk or dairy products.

BIOMIL® SOY does not contain any lactose, gluten, peanuts, saccharose or fructose.

The energy density of BIOMIL® SOY is based on that of breast milk. 100 ml of BIOMIL® SOY reconstituted at 13.5% provides 67.5 kcal. The energy content of breast milk varies between 65 and 70 kcal per 100 ml.

The split of energy between proteins, lipids and carbohydrates has been developed so as to obtain high digestive tolerance.

BIOMIL® SOY complies with the standards of the Codex Alimentarius and the recommendations of the European Union.
name: Fasska Biomil Soy Milk Free Diet 400 gm
nameWithoutSubText: Fasska Biomil Soy Milk Free Diet

bengaliName: বায়োমিল ২ ফলো-আপ  দুধ ফর্মুলা  (৬-১২ মাস) ৪০০ গ্রাম
longDesc:
Origin: Belgium
BIOMIL® 2 is a follow-up milk for infants of 6 months and over.

BIOMIL® 2 is a preparation, in the form of a powder, based on modified cows’ milk taking into account the nutritional needs of the child. Prepared in the strictest of hygiene conditions, the formula contains partially skimmed cows’ milk, vegetable fats and maltodextrin, to which a perfectly balanced set of vitamins and minerals has been added.

BIOMIL® 2 may be used as a supplement to or replacement for breast milk should this be lacking or insufficient. As follow-up milk is intended “for infants of 5 months and over” and constitutes “the principal liquid element of a progressively diversified diet” (Commission of the European Communities, 1991), it must supply the elements that weaning food does not provide in sufficient quantities, i.e., proteins, calcium, iron, essential fatty acids, etc.

BIOMIL® 2complies with the standards of the Codex Alimentarius, the recommendations of the European Communities and those of the European Society for Paediatric Gastroenterology, Hepatology and Nutrition (ESPGHAN).
name: Biomil 2 Follow-Up Milk Formula (6-12 M) 400 gm
nameWithoutSubText: Biomil 2 Follow-Up Milk Formula (6-12 M)

bengaliName: বায়োমিল ১ গুঁড়া দুধ (০-৬ মাস) ৩৫০ গ্রাম
longDesc:
Origin: Belgium
Breast milk is the nutrition that is best suited to infants.
BIOMIL® 1 may be used as a supplement to or replacement for breast milk should this be lacking or insufficient.

BIOMIL® 1 is a preparation based on modified cows’ milk so as to ensure it is precisely adapted to the nutritional needs of infants.

BIOMIL® 1 contains partially skimmed cows’ milk, demineralised whey, vegetable oils, lactose and supplements of calcium, zinc and copper, iron salts and 14 vitamins.

BIOMIL® 1 is a milk formula that is especially well tolerated by infants aged between 0 and 6 months. It may be used as a replacement for breast milk should this not be available, or as weaning food if the quantity of breast milk no longer meets the infant’s needs.

BIOMIL® 1 complies with the standards of the Codex Alimentarius and with the recommendations of the European Union, as well as with those of the European Society for Paediatric Gastroenterology, Hepatology and Nutrition (ESPGHAN).
name: Biomil 1 Milk Powder (0-6 months) 350 gm
nameWithoutSubText: Biomil 1 Milk Powder (0-6 months)
